properties.entry: INSERT ALL INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NO , REPORT_TITLE , REPORTED_ID , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_MODIFY , T_F , USER_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPID.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , ? ) INTO CER_REPORT VALUES ( SEQ_REPID.CURRVAL , ? ) INTO NEWS VALUES ( SEQ_NEID.NEXTVAL , ? , 1 , SEQ_REPID.NEXTVAL , DEFAULT , SYSDATE ) SELECT * FROM DUAL

INSERT ALL INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NO , REPORT_TITLE , REPORTED_ID , REPORT_FILE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_MODIFY , T_F , USER_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPID.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , ? ) INTO CER_REPORT VALUES ( SEQ_REPID.CURRVAL , ? ) INTO NEWS VALUES ( SEQ_NEID.NEXTVAL , ? , 1 , SEQ_REPID.CURRVAL , DEFAULT , SYSDATE ) SELECT * FROM DUAL

INSERT ALL INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NO , REPORT_TITLE , REPORTED_ID , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_MODIFY , T_F , USER_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPID.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , ? ) INTO CHALL_REPORT VALUES ( SEQ_REPID.CURRVAL , ? ) INTO NEWS VALUES ( SEQ_NEID.NEXTVAL , ? , 1 , SEQ_REPID.CURRVAL , DEFAULT , SYSDATE ) SELECT * FROM DUAL

INSERT ALL INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NO , REPORT_TITLE , REPORTED_ID , REPORT_FILE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_MODIFY , T_F , USER_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPID.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , ? ) INTO CHALL_REPORT VALUES ( SEQ_REPID.CURRVAL , ? ) INTO NEWS VALUES ( SEQ_NEID.NEXTVAL , ? , 1 , SEQ_REPID.CURRVAL , DEFAULT , SYSDATE ) SELECT * FROM DUAL

INSERT ALL INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NO , REPORT_TITLE , REPORTED_ID , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_MODIFY , T_F , USER_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPID.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , ? ) INTO BOARD_REPORT VALUES ( SEQ_REPID.CURRVAL , ? ) INTO NEWS VALUES ( SEQ_NEID.NEXTVAL , ? , 1 , SEQ_REPID.CURRVAL , DEFAULT , SYSDATE ) SELECT * FROM DUAL

INSERT ALL INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NO , REPORT_TITLE , REPORTED_ID , REPORT_FILE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_MODIFY , T_F , USER_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPID.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , ? ) INTO BOARD_REPORT VALUES ( SEQ_REPID.CURRVAL , ? ) INTO NEWS VALUES ( SEQ_NEID.NEXTVAL , ? , 1 , SEQ_REPID.CURRVAL , DEFAULT , SYSDATE ) SELECT * FROM DUAL

INSERT ALL INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NO , REPORT_TITLE , REPORTED_ID , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_MODIFY , T_F , USER_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPID.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , ? ) INTO CAFE_REPORT VALUES ( SEQ_REPID.CURRVAL , ? ) INTO NEWS VALUES ( SEQ_NEID.NEXTVAL , ? , 1 , SEQ_REPID.CURRVAL , DEFAULT , SYSDATE ) SELECT * FROM DUAL

INSERT ALL INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NO , REPORT_TITLE , REPORTED_ID , REPORT_FILE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_MODIFY , T_F , USER_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPID.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , ? ) INTO CAFE_REPORT VALUES ( SEQ_REPID.CURRVAL , ? ) INTO NEWS VALUES ( SEQ_NEID.NEXTVAL , ? , 1 , SEQ_REPID.CURRVAL , DEFAULT , SYSDATE ) SELECT * FROM DUAL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT

SELECT RNUM , REPORT_NO , REPORT_TITLE , REPORTED_ID , REPORT_FILE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_MODIFY , T_F , REPORT_STATUS , USER_ID FROM RELIST WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND REPORT_STATUS = 'N'
SELECT REPORT_NO , REPORT_TITLE , REPORTED_ID , REPORT_FILE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_MODIFY , T_F , REPORT_STATUS , USER_ID FROM REPORT WHERE REPORT_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE USER_ID = ? AND REPORT_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT RNUM , REPORT_NO , REPORT_TITLE , REPORTED_ID , REPORT_FILE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_MODIFY , T_F , REPORT_STATUS , USER_ID FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT REPORT_NO , REPORT_TITLE , REPORTED_ID , REPORT_FILE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_MODIFY , T_F , REPORT_STATUS , USER_ID FROM REPORT WHERE REPORT_STATUS = 'N' AND USER_ID = ? ORDER BY REPORT_NO DESC)A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE REPORT SET REPORT_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE REPORT_NO = ?
UPDATE REPORT SET T_F = 'T' WHERE REPORT_NO = ?

SELECT C.CAFE_CODE , CH.CHALL_NO , CE.CER_ID , B.BOARD_SEQ FROM REPORT R LEFT JOIN CAFE_REPORT C ON (R.REPORT_NO=C.REPORT_NO) LEFT JOIN CHALL_REPORT CH ON (R.REPORT_NO=CH.REPORT_NO) LEFT JOIN CER_REPORT CE ON (R.REPORT_NO=CE.REPORT_NO) LEFT JOIN BOARD_REPORT B ON (R.REPORT_NO=B.REPORT_NO) WHERE R.REPORT_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE REPORTED_ID = ? AND REPORT_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT RNUM , REPORT_NO , REPORT_TITLE , REPORTED_ID , REPORT_FILE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_MODIFY , T_F , REPORT_STATUS , USER_ID FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT REPORT_NO , REPORT_TITLE , REPORTED_ID , REPORT_FILE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_MODIFY , T_F , REPORT_STATUS , USER_ID FROM REPORT WHERE REPORT_STATUS = 'N' AND REPORTED_ID = ? ORDER BY REPORT_NO DESC)A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE REPORT_STATUS = 'N' AND T_F = 'F' AND TO_CHAR(REPORT_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') = (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') FROM dual)

SELECT REPORT_NO , REPORT_TITLE , REPORTED_ID , REPORT_FILE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_MODIFY , T_F , REPORT_STATUS , USER_ID FROM REPORT WHERE ROWNUM <= 5 AND TO_CHAR(REPORT_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') = (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') FROM dual) ORDER BY REPORT_DATE DESC
